manipulation_analysis.manipulated_entity: The text on the punching bag
manipulation_analysis.explanation: The word on the punching bag looks blurry and doesn't match the crispness of the rest of the bag. It's like someone stuck a low-quality sticker on it.

inferred_original_state.description: The punching bag would have a clear, sharp word printed on it that matches the quality of the rest of the bag.

inverse_edit_instructions.Effect: Revert the text on the punching bag to its original appearance.
Explanation: The text 'FIGHTTECH' on the punching bag.
Change the text on the punching bag from 'FIGHTTECH' back to 'CENTURY', ensuring it is clear and matches the original style and font.
